page.title: 09MAIDENHALL FARM ESTATE 2
page.content: The service road and cul-de-sac layout gives added security to pedestrians and children playing, and enhances privacy. The brick built houses and bungalows are of a traditional style & built to high standards.All houses have fitted bath & bedrooms ,gas central heating and garages.Features of the more expensive types include extensive use of insulating materials,double glazed patio doors and full decoration of interior rooms. 1985 prices range from Â£39,950 to Â£58,500. Shopping facilities in Highnam at present are limited to a post office/ general store,but developers,Lovell Homes,plan to include further shopping facilities as part of the development.
